TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SecurityContext extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class SecurityContext Implements IDisposable
public ref class SecurityContext sealed : IDisposable

summary.span: 封裝並散佈跨執行緒傳送之執行內容的所有安全性相關資料。

span.span: Encapsulates and propagates all security-related data for execution contexts transferred across threads.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A物件擷取所有安全性相關的資訊，包括資訊中包含的邏輯執行緒和物件。A object captures all security-related information for a logical thread, including the information contained in the and objects. 此設定允許的 Windows 身分識別和安全性項目可自動傳播時堆疊上會複製，並在非同步執行緒之間傳輸。This configuration allows the Windows identity and the security elements on the stack to be propagated automatically when the is copied and transferred across asynchronous threads. > [!NOTE] > Common language runtime (CLR) 並知道模擬使用 managed 程式碼，不是模擬以外 managed 程式碼，例如執行可透過平台執行的作業叫用 unmanaged 程式碼或透過直接呼叫 Win32 函式。The common language runtime (CLR) is aware of impersonation operations performed using only managed code, not of impersonation performed outside of managed code, such as through platform invoke to unmanaged code or through direct calls to Win32 functions. 只能管理物件流向可跨非同步的點，除非`alwaysFlowImpersonationPolicy`項目已設定為`true`(``)。Only managed objects can flow across asynchronous points, unless the `alwaysFlowImpersonationPolicy` element has been set to `true` (``). 設定`alwaysFlowImpersonationPolicy`元素`true`指定 Windows 身分識別一律流動到非同步的點，無論模擬執行的方式。Setting the `alwaysFlowImpersonationPolicy` element to `true` specifies that the Windows identity always flows across asynchronous points, regardless of how impersonation was performed. 如需詳細資訊傳送到非同步點 unmanaged 模擬，請參閱[ <alwaysFlowImpersonationPolicy>元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/alwaysflowimpersonationpolicy-element.md)。For more information about flowing unmanaged impersonation across asynchronous points, see [<alwaysFlowImpersonationPolicy> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/alwaysflowimpersonationpolicy-element.md). 是較大的一部分流程及移轉時流動或移轉。The is part of the larger and flows or migrates when the flows or migrates. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此類型會實作介面。This type implements the interface. 當您完成使用類型時，您應該會處置它直接或間接。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接處置的類型，呼叫其方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要為其配置間接，使用語言建構例如`using`（C# 中） 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 「 使用物件的實作 IDisposable 」 一節介面 > 主題。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic.

Public Shared Function Capture () As SecurityContext

summary.span: 擷取目前執行緒的安全性內容。

span.span: Captures the security context for the current thread.

returns.span: 目前執行緒的安全性內容。

span.span: The security context for the current thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 擷取的安全性內容可以套用至另一個執行緒。The captured security context can be applied to another thread. 組成和執行的執行緒。The consists of the and the for the executing thread.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Security.SecurityContext CreateCopy() cil managed

summary.span: 建立目前安全性內容的複本。

span.span: Creates a copy of the current security context.

returns.span: 目前執行緒的安全性內容。

span.span: The security context for the current thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必須已透過擷取或複製作業取得目前的內容。The current context must have been acquired through a capture or a copy operation. 這個方法可用於套用擷取至多個執行緒。This method is useful for applying a captured to multiple threads.

exception.span: 目前的安全性內容是先前已用過、已在應用程式定義域之間封送處理，或者不是透過 方法所取得。

span.span: The current security context has been previously used, was marshaled across application domains, or was not acquired through the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

summary.span: 將 類別目前的執行個體所使用的資源全部釋出。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Dispose` 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 在呼叫`Dispose`，您必須釋放所有參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的所佔用。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 `Dispose` 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基礎結構元件會使用方法來判斷是否要傳送非同步作業期間的資訊。The method is used by infrastructure components to determine whether to transfer the information during asynchronous operations.

summary.span: 還原安全性內容在非同步執行緒之間的流量。

span.span: Restores the flow of the security context across asynchronous threads.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法透過呼叫方法來反轉先前的效果方法呼叫。The method is called by the method to reverse the effect of a prior method call.

exception.span: 安全性內容為 或空字串。

span.span: The security context is or an empty string.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void Run (System.Security.SecurityContext securityContext, System.Threading.ContextCallback callback, object state);

public: static void Run(System::Security::SecurityContext ^ securityContext, System::Threading::ContextCallback ^ callback, System::Object ^ state);

span.span: The security context to set.

param.name: callback
param.span: 委派，表示要在指定的安全性內容中執行的方法。

span.span: The delegate that represents the method to run in the specified security context.

param.name: state
param.span: 要傳遞至回呼 (Callback) 方法的物件。

span.span: The object to pass to the callback method.

summary.span: 在目前執行緒上的指定安全性內容中執行指定的方法。

span.span: Runs the specified method in the specified security context on the current thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呼叫完成時，目前執行緒的安全性內容會回到先前的狀態。The security context for the current thread is returned to its previous state when the method call is complete. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法，以指定的安全性內容中執行的方法。The following code example shows how to use the method to execute a method in a specified security context. [!code-csharp[System.Security.SecurityContext.Run#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.SecurityContext.Run/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.SecurityContext.Run#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.SecurityContext.Run/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig valuetype System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl SuppressFlow() cil managed
Public Shared Function SuppressFlow () As AsyncFlowControl

summary.span: 抑制安全性內容在非同步執行緒之間的流量。

span.span: Suppresses the flow of the security context across asynchronous threads.
An structure for restoring the flow.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來隱藏的流程目前執行緒上非同步作業的資訊。Use this method to suppress the flow of information on the current thread for asynchronous operations. 只有知道執行使用 managed 程式碼的模擬作業的 common language runtime (CLR)。The common language runtime (CLR) is only aware of the impersonation operations performed using managed code. CLR 不了解模擬執行外部 managed 程式碼，例如平台叫用 unmanaged 程式碼會執行模擬，或是透過呼叫 Win32 函式。The CLR has no knowledge of impersonation performed outside of managed code, such as platform invokes to unmanaged code that does the impersonation, or through calls to Win32 functions. 跨非同步的點，您必須使用受管理的流量識別和方法。To flow identity across asynchronous points you must use the managed and methods. 使用方法在傳回結構，以傳回物件到先前的狀態。Use the method on the returned structure to return the object to its previous state. 這個方法受到如權限。This method is protected with a for permission. 完全信任的元件可以呼叫這個方法，以隱藏的流程非同步呼叫期間的資訊。A fully trusted component can call this method to suppress the flow of the information during asynchronous calls. 當隱藏流程時，方法會傳回`null`。When the flow is suppressed, the method returns `null`.

permission.span: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig valuetype System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl SuppressFlowWindowsIdentity() cil managed
Public Shared Function SuppressFlowWindowsIdentity () As AsyncFlowControl

summary.span: 抑制目前安全性內容中 Windows 識別部分在非同步執行緒之間的流量。

span.span: Suppresses the flow of the Windows identity portion of the current security context across asynchronous threads.
A structure for restoring the flow.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要隱藏的 Windows 身分識別流程中使用這個方法時在非同步執行緒之間移轉。Use this method to suppress the flow of the Windows identity when the migrates across asynchronous threads. 使用方法在傳回結構，以傳回物件到先前的狀態。Use the method on the returned structure to return the object to its previous state. > [!NOTE] > Common language runtime (CLR) 並知道模擬使用 managed 程式碼，不是模擬以外 managed 程式碼，例如執行可透過平台執行的作業叫用 unmanaged 程式碼或透過直接呼叫 Win32 函式。The common language runtime (CLR) is aware of impersonation operations performed using only managed code, not of impersonation performed outside of managed code, such as through platform invoke to unmanaged code or through direct calls to Win32 functions. 只能管理物件流向可跨非同步的點，除非`alwaysFlowImpersonationPolicy`項目已設定為`true`(``)。Only managed objects can flow across asynchronous points, unless the `alwaysFlowImpersonationPolicy` element has been set to `true` (``). 設定`alwaysFlowImpersonationPolicy`元素`true`指定 Windows 身分識別一律流動到非同步的點，無論模擬執行的方式。Setting the `alwaysFlowImpersonationPolicy` element to `true` specifies that the Windows identity always flows across asynchronous points, regardless of how impersonation was performed. 如需詳細資訊傳送到非同步點 unmanaged 模擬，請參閱[ \ 項目](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/alwaysflowimpersonationpolicy-element.md)。For more information about flowing unmanaged impersonation across asynchronous points, see [\ Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/alwaysflowimpersonationpolicy-element.md).

permission.span: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
